channel.title: Manage Workspaces on
channel.description: Recent content in Manage Workspaces on

item.title: Create Workspaces
item.description:
This section explains how to create a workspace.

Prerequisites

You should have the Workspace Creation permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Creation permission.

  2. Click Workspace Management.

  3. Click Create on the page.

  4. On the Create Workspace page, set the basic information for the workspace and then click Next.

    Parameter Description

    Name

item.title: View Workspace List
item.description:
This section explains how to view the workspace list.

Prerequisites

You should have the Workspace Viewing permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Viewing permission.

  2. Click Workspace Management.

    • The workspace list displays all workspaces on the KubeSphere platform.

    • In the workspace list, click the name of a workspace to view and manage resources within it.

item.title: Edit Workspace Information
item.description:
This section explains how to edit workspace information.

You can edit the alias and description of a workspace. KubeSphere does not support editing the name of an already created workspace.

Prerequisites

You should have the Workspace Management permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

Steps

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Management permission.

  2. Click Workspace Management.

  3. Click on the right of the workspace you want to edit, then choose Edit Information from the dropdown list.

  4. In the Edit Information dialog, set the alias and description for the workspace, then click OK.

    Parameter Description

    Alias

item.title: Delete Workspaces
item.description:
This section explains how to delete a workspace.

Note

The system workspace system-workspace cannot be deleted.

Prerequisites

You should have the Workspace Management permission on the KubeSphere platform. For more information, refer to "Platform Roles".

Delete a Single Workspace

  1. Log in to the KubeSphere web console with a user who has the Workspace Management permission.

  2. Click Workspace Management.

  3. Click on the right of the workspace you want to delete, then choose Delete from the dropdown list.

  4. In the Delete Workspace dialog, enter the name of the workspace, then click OK.
